LanguageData.ARA_TerrainMoveSpeedHediff.label: Creep addition: movement speed
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainMoveSpeedHediff.description: The weave worn by this Arachne insect allows it to move faster on creeps.The longer it stays on the creep, the stronger the effect becomes, and the effect gradually diminishes when it leaves the creep.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainWorkSpeedHediff.label: Creep addition: working speed
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainWorkSpeedHediff.description: The weave that Arachne Insect wears allows it to work faster on the creep.The longer it stays on the creep, the stronger the effect becomes, and the effect gradually diminishes when it leaves the creep.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainCooldownHediff.label: Creep Addition: Combat Reaction
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainCooldownHediff.description: The weave worn by this Arachne insect reduces the cooldown time of melee and ranged attacks on creeps.The longer you stay on the creep, the stronger the effect becomes, and the effect gradually diminishes when you leave the creep.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainCooldownHediff.stages.0.label: none
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainAccuracyHediff.label: Creep addition: Shooting accuracy
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainAccuracyHediff.description: The fabric worn by this Arachne insect increases the accuracy of shooting on creeps.The longer it stays on the creep, the stronger the effect becomes, and the more it leaves the creep, the more the effect gradually diminishes.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainAccuracyHediff.stages.0.label: none
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainCaravanSpeedHediff.label: Creep addition: Caravan reinforcement
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainCaravanSpeedHediff.descriptio: The weave worn by this Arachne Insect gives it higher caravan speed and trading ability on creeps.The longer it stays on the creep, the stronger the effect becomes, and the effect gradually fades when it leaves the creep.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainRestRateHediff.label: Creep addition: rest speed
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainRestRateHediff.description: The weave worn by this Arachne insect gives it a higher resting speed on the creep.The longer it stays on the creep, the stronger the effect becomes, and the effect gradually diminishes when it leaves the creep.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainRestRateHediff.stages.0.label: none
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainHealHediff.label: Creep addition: treatment
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainHealHediff.description: The fabric worn by this Arachne insect gives it the ability to heal others.
LanguageData.ARA_Heal_By_Nurse_Hediff.label: insect swarm healing
LanguageData.ARA_Heal_By_Nurse_Hediff.description: The healing elements of the Arachnid bugs cause abnormal proliferation of tissue cells, allowing for rapid healing of wounds.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainTemptHediff.label: Creep addition: Enchantment
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainTemptHediff.description: The fabric worn by this Arachne insect gives it the ability to manipulate minds and mislead others.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainTerrorRoar_Hediff.label: Creep addition: Roar
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainTerrorRoar_Hediff.description: The fabric worn by this Arachne insect gives it the ability to emit a majestic roar, frighten and startle its enemies, and cause them to flee in all directions.
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper_Hediff.label: creep laying
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper_Hediff.description: The Arachne worm species is currently developing creep, which changes the surrounding terrain at regular intervals.
